articles.caption: A look at Krafton (PUBG's creator) H1 2022.  Q2 Rev $326.5M
articles.title: Krafton's successful H1 2022 is thanks to PUBG Mobile
articles.description: PUBG: Battlegrounds publisher Krafton released its financials for the first half of 2022, and much of its success came from the shooter's mobile version.
